title: Patricof on Virtual VC, Reiser on Staying Busy
itunes:title: Patricof on Virtual VC, Reiser on Staying Busy
description:
Alan Patricof, Chairman Emeritus & Co-Founder of Greycroft Ventures, discusses how VC investing is functioning in a virtual world. And Comedian and Actor Paul Reiser talks about how he is keeping busy during the pandemic and how he hooked up with Netflix for his show "The Kominsky Method."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
